document.full_text: a federal judge dismissed a lawsuit by two of bernard madoff's former customers accusing the u.s. securities and exchange commission of negligence for failing to uncover the now-imprisoned swindler's ponzi scheme.
document.title: madoff investors' lawsuit against sec thrown out
lines_and_colors: a federal judge dismissed a lawsuit by two of bernard madoff's former customers accusing the u.s. securities and exchange commission of negligence for failing to uncover the now-imprisoned swindler's ponzi scheme.
